summary: In France in 1649, the services of the Four Musketeers are needed again, and they run into some old foes from twenty years before.
cast: Michael York|Oliver Reed|Frank Finlay|C. Thomas Howell|Kim Cattrall|Geraldine Chaplin|Roy Kinnear|Christopher Lee|Philippe Noiret|Richard Chamberlain|Eusebio Lázaro|Alan Howard|David Birkin|Bill Paterson|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Billy Connolly|Servane Ducorps|William J. Fletcher|Laure Sabardin|Marcelline Collard|Pat Roach|Jesús Ruyman|Fernando De Juan|Barry Burgues|Leon Greene|Ágata Lys|Bob Todd|Lucy Hardwick|Aldo Sambrell|Jack Taylor|Ricardo Palacios|Luciano Federico|Carmen Fernández|Rafael de la Cruz|German Estebas|Jesús García|Fernando Simón|Fernando Prados
keywords: horseback chase|held at swordpoint|cyrano|cyrano de bergerac character|musketeer
title: El regreso de los mosqueteros
